validate.advnull: Error: I couldn't find your Adversary, so I won't be validating color identity.
validate.unrecognized: **I did not recognize the following cards (this is typical, particularly for Adversaries):**
validate.illegal: **The following cards are not Modern-legal, or have some other problem (typically, you have too much of this card in your deck):**
validate.badcolor: **The following cards do not match your Adversary's color identity:**
decklistok: **To the best of my knowledge, there are no problems with your deck.**
*HOWEVER, I do not check for minimum deck size, maximum sideboard size, color identity, or Adversary-specific bans.*
*IMPORTANT: If your decklist is not properly formatted, the best of my knowledge isn't very good!*
validate.contact: __If there is a problem with this report, please send a message to your local bot moderator.__

spoiler.unabletofind: Sorry, I couldn't find any adversaries matching that name.

unabletofind: Sorry, I couldn't find that set.
As a reminder, you should use the set code (`M10`, `VIS`, `KTK`, etc).

adversaries.unabletofind: Sorry, I didn't find any data.

roll.toomanydice: W-wow, that's a lot of dice, Senpai -- please don't make me roll all those...

seraph: Hey, I think I'm receiving a telepathic message!
*Closes her eyes and furrows her brow...*

castelia: Her? She's got a big shield, and she's... I, umm.... umm....
waifu: Waifu? Oh, I know one. Seraph is Hawk's waifu!
pet: D-did I do good? I did good, right?

puke: O-ow... I'm sorry, senpai... P-please don't hit me again...
pain: I'm s-sorry, Senpai... I won't m-mess up again...
smack.blue: I won't do what you say, you big bully! Ah, um... please don't tell any moderators about this...

bully.invalid: U-umm... Bullying is mean! Please don't make me do it...
meanthings: $NAME, y-you are a s-stupid dumb-head! Dummy! Umm...
*steals $NAME's pocket money as a generous donation to her upkeep.*
$NAME, your waifu is a... a shit! Ummm... sorry...
Umm, what is the difference between $NAME's waifu and Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh? Chandra can wait before wanting people to tap her! Hehe, he... Umm...
bully.targetself: I-I guess I'm just a worthless automaton after all...

oracle.unabletofind: Sorry, I was unable to find any cards matching your query.
oracle.toomanymatches: Sorry, there were too many matches -- could you try being more specific with your query?
oracle.multiplematches: The following cards matched your query. Please be more specific to get oracle text.

err: Sorry, something went wrong. Please safely locate your nearest bot moderator and tell him about this. And p-please don't hit me...
errformat: Sorry, something went wrong. Was your command properly formatted?
